movie.title: Almost Che
movie.description_intro: Delivery man Dae-Oh is hopelessly in love with the student Ye-Rin. Inspired by Che Guevara's words he disguise himself as a student to make the impossible possible, but things get more revolutionary than he ever anticipated.
movie.description_full: Delivery man Dae-Oh is hopelessly in love with the student Ye-Rin. Inspired by Che Guevara's words he disguise himself as a student to make the impossible possible, but things get more revolutionary than he ever anticipated.

movies.title: The Contract
movies.summary: Struggling actor Chih-Wen (Michael Hui) got a raw deal from his company, MTV Studios, by signing a binding 8-year contract and was only given one opportunity to perform live thus far. Soon, he received a better deal with a rival company, who promised a 5-year contract and better opportunities to perform and make money. Since he cannot start working for the new company because of his current 8-year contract with MTV, he and his scientist-aspiring brother (Ricky Hui), with the help of magician Shih-Chieh (Sam Hui), attempts to steal the contract from his ruthless manager.
movies.description_full: Struggling actor Chih-Wen (Michael Hui) got a raw deal from his company, MTV Studios, by signing a binding 8-year contract and was only given one opportunity to perform live thus far. Soon, he received a better deal with a rival company, who promised a 5-year contract and better opportunities to perform and make money. Since he cannot start working for the new company because of his current 8-year contract with MTV, he and his scientist-aspiring brother (Ricky Hui), with the help of magician Shih-Chieh (Sam Hui), attempts to steal the contract from his ruthless manager.

movies.title: The Last Ride
movies.summary: Touching. Very funny. Best Inspirational family and friendship. Realistic.
movies.description_full: Touching. Very funny. Best Inspirational family and friendship. Realistic.

movies.title: Hatchet III
movies.summary: A search and recovery team heads into the haunted swamp to pick up the pieces, and Marybeth learns the secret to ending the voodoo curse that has left Victor Crowley haunting and terrorizing Honey Island Swamp for decades.
movies.description_full: A search and recovery team heads into the haunted swamp to pick up the pieces, and Marybeth learns the secret to ending the voodoo curse that has left Victor Crowley haunting and terrorizing Honey Island Swamp for decades.
movies.synopsis: A search and recovery team heads into the haunted swamp to pick up the pieces, and Marybeth learns the secret to ending the voodoo curse that has left Victor Crowley haunting and terrorizing Honey Island Swamp for decades.

movies.title: Detective
movies.summary: In a palace of Paris. Two detectives are investigating a two-year-old murder. Emile and Francoise Chenal are putting pressure on Jim Fox Warner, a boxing manager, who owes them a huge amount of money. But Jim also owes money to the Mafia, and it seems the boxing match he is counting on to bail out will not be sufficient...
